api.name: generateImage
api.description: Generate an image based on the given prompt using Alibaba's Tongyi Wanxiang model

model.description: The model name to use for image generation

prompt.description: Positive prompt describing elements and visual features desired in the generated image. Supports Chinese and English, up to 800 characters

negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt describing elements you don't want in the image. Supports Chinese and English, up to 500 characters

size.description: Resolution of the output image. Width and height should be between 768 and 1440 pixels, up to 2 million pixels total

n.description: Number of images to generate, between 1 and 4

seed.description: Random seed to control generation randomness. Range: [0, 2147483647]

prompt_extend.description: Whether to enable intelligent prompt rewriting for better results. Only affects positive prompts

meta.description: 该插件利用阿里巴巴的通义万相模型，根据文本提示生成图像。
meta.title: 通义万相图像生成器

ALIBABA_API_KEY.title: Alibaba API Key
ALIBABA_API_KEY.description: 用于使用阿里通义万相模型的API密钥

systemRole: 该插件利用阿里巴巴的通义万象模型，根据文本提示生成图像。
